channel.title: Admin and Owner posistion on 508 server
channel.description:
ok sorry to bug people but i was just wondering how i might be able to change my posistion on a 508 server source...
Dont worry i have searched my self and still found nothing its beed about 3 days now and i have decided to ask, so dont think im lazy :) But any way i have searched this forum but there has been nothing specific to how my problem might get fixed.
I have tried over 10 sources or more i think trying to find a character folder and finding my name in it but its only a .dat file, and i have not found a java file that is notepad so i can change the rights. please dont tell me how to open a .dat file that will get me know where because i have heard that it is no where close to that. And please tell me if it will work for all sources. Thank you so much for your help!!!

item.title: Admin and Owner posistion on 508 server
item.dc:creator: @O_G_aka_DaLe ØϺĞ™ âķâ ĐãĽè
item.description:
@O_G_aka_DaLe wrote:

on 508’s there is no p.rights 3, only 1 for mod and 2 for admin. You can either just have everything Admin to do or use p.username.equals (then only you can use it)

Read full topic

item.title: Admin and Owner posistion on 508 server
item.dc:creator: @zima68 zima68
item.description:
@zima68 wrote:

[quote=“maddy, post:5, topic:237251”]omg thank you, you are amazing but dont i have to compile now? which is in cmd rs2.io but there is a problem there too… when i try to run it has

‘“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_10\bin\javac.exe”’ is not recognized as an inte
rnal or external command,
operable program or batch file.
Press any key to continue . . .

this is what i have in edit for it

@echo off
cd …/src
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_10\bin\javac.exe” -cp . -d …/bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/io/*.java
pause

and that is my current java and i tried 07 too. can you help there?
you would be twice as amazing :)[/quote] you need to edit the run.bat* file to the jdk file you are useing… ^^
like there is written:
C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_10\bin\javac.exe… if you have
jdk1.6.0_16… just edit this to ^ jdk16.0_16… and it should proberly work…

Read full topic

item.title: Admin and Owner posistion on 508 server
item.dc:creator: @En321 En321
item.description:
@En321 wrote:

Ok :] what u do about the admin thing for mine (Tokkul Scape v3.5) its 508 and i go into bin\characters\main save*your char name* and open it with WORDPAD not notepad lol notepad dont work on it for some reason. but go over 2 p.rights0 change the 0 to a 2. It will make you Admin i havent figured out how to make it owner yet.

Read full topic

item.description:
@hah_bah_gee wrote:

go to your Java folder, copy the Java folders name, now go back to compiler, right click, choose edit, now paste it in the spot where it says jdk1.6.0_10 or whatever yours says, that way it makes sure you don’t have a typo…

item.title: Admin and Owner posistion on 508 server
item.dc:creator: @hah_bah_gee hah bah gee
item.description:
@hah_bah_gee wrote:

Ok on Dragon force’s source (im assuming others as well)

Go into Src > Paladino76 > rs2 > io > Login.java

Once you have login.java open search for:

p.username.equals

You should get something like:

            if (p.username.equals("dragon force")) {
                p.rights = 2;
            }

Change whats in parenthesis (In this case its “dragon force”) to your desired username.

Read full topic
item.source: Admin and Owner posistion on 508 server
